title: Oil Falls After Trump Signals US Response to Iran Is On Hold
description: Oil fell for the first time in six days after US President Donald Trump signaled he may hold off on attacking Iran for now.
content: Oil fell for the first time in six days after US President Donald Trump signaled he may hold off on attacking Iran for now.
